MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G2 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Sauchiehall Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.52pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.33pm on Monday 18th January 2021.
